body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Keith Morris and the customer's name is Andrea Flores.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! This is Keith Morris from Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Keith! I'm Andrea Flores. I'm excited to learn more about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Andrea! What kind of motorcycle are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for something that's good for long rides and comfortable.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We have some excellent options that fit those criteria. Before we get started, could I have your email address, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that, Andrea. Could you also provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! It's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks for sharing that information! Now, about our motorcycles. I would recommend our touring models for comfort during long rides.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds perfect! I'm looking forward to checking them out.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Fantastic! I appreciate your time today, Andrea. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
